summary: Provides a PySide6 graphical interface that guides users through the complete ANSYS MAPDL simulation process, including geometry creation, material assignment, mesh definition, solver execution, and result visualization via PyVista, all organized into dedicated tabs.
business_intent: Enable engineers and analysts to configure, run, and inspect MAPDL simulations through an intuitive visual environment, reducing reliance on scripting and accelerating the designâ€‘analysis cycle.
